caption:
This photograph depicts a person engaged in fishing, likely in a coastal or river environment given the backdrop and type of activity visible. The individual, who is smiling, is partially obscured by a large pile of silver, sleek fish which have been freshly caught and are piled in the foreground of the image. The person is holding up a fishing net, which too contains several fish, indicating a successful catch.

The setting includes a body of water in the background which appears calm, with several boats anchored or slowly moving. The surroundings suggest a rich natural environment with trees and a relatively clear sky, hinting at pleasant weather.

The quality and colors of the photograph suggest it might be a bit dated, capturing a moment of joy and accomplishment in an outdoor, aquatic setting. The composition of the photo, focusing prominently on the catch and the happy fisher, evokes a sense of productivity and success in the activity being performed.
title: Terry bigford removes fresh-killed salmon from chill tank at the domsea aquacultural site, manchester
